title: LIC - Smart Shopping List
summary: Go shopping easier, faster and safer.
description: Intelligent Shopping List (ISL) is an application of great help to make your shopping lists and manage your expenses easily and quickly.You'll be able to keep a weekly and monthly monitoring of expenditure you make on a day to day by graphs will be updated on every purchase.Furthermore, based on your purchases, it will create a food pyramid, so you can see how your diet is beingAs you complete lists, information products will show saving for their evolution.Once you have installed the application and have at your disposal 20 predefined categories in which more than 600 products are divided among them. And if you are not enough, you have the ability to create and edit what you need.It incorporates 'Social LIC', a way to share your lists with friends and family. It allows you to buy in sync with any friend you have added.With its innovative 'Buy Mode' take your mobile and make the purchase, it becomes fast and effective real-time controlling the cost of your shopping cart. This will avoid possible 'mistakes' when checkout by supermarkets.It also has many other features:  - Assign colors to better distinguish your lists  - Set your own currency  - Add and edit measurement systems to your liking  - Add your frequent markets through geolocation.  - Share your lists with friends or family and make the purchase synchronously  - Share your lists by email or to your favorite social networks  - Back up your SD and in the Cloud  - Edit your profile to use a custom avatar and your type of diet (omnivore, vegetarian, vegan ...)
descriptionHTML:
Intelligent Shopping List (ISL) is an application of great help to make your shopping lists and manage your expenses easily and quickly.
You'll be able to keep a weekly and monthly monitoring of expenditure you make on a day to day by graphs will be updated on every purchase.
Furthermore, based on your purchases, it will create a food pyramid, so you can see how your diet is being
As you complete lists, information products will show saving for their evolution.
Once you have installed the application and have at your disposal 20 predefined categories in which more than 600 products are divided among them. And if you are not enough, you have the ability to create and edit what you need.
It incorporates 'Social LIC', a way to share your lists with friends and family. It allows you to buy in sync with any friend you have added.
With its innovative 'Buy Mode' take your mobile and make the purchase, it becomes fast and effective real-time controlling the cost of your shopping cart. This will avoid possible 'mistakes' when checkout by supermarkets.
It also has many other features:
- Assign colors to better distinguish your lists
- Set your own currency
- Add and edit measurement systems to your liking
- Add your frequent markets through geolocation.
- Share your lists with friends or family and make the purchase synchronously
- Share your lists by email or to your favorite social networks
- Back up your SD and in the Cloud
- Edit your profile to use a custom avatar and your type of diet (omnivore, vegetarian, vegan ...)
comments: Difficult to figure out how to use it. What's with "deaths purchased"?

This app is ridiculous and NOT USER FRIENDLY WHATSOEVER First of all,  this 'whatever you want to call this time waster'  is so complicated and very user UNfriendly. Even if it was operable, can we say anal? What a hassle for little return. Cost benefit analysis deems this app A WASTE OF TIME. wow. Incredible waste. Uninstalling immediately
¡App genial! Buena ayuda para gestionar y controlar las compras rapidamente ¡recomendable!
